citations.title: Vickers AJ, Elkin EB. Decision curve analysis: a novel method for evaluating prediction models
TRIPOD+AI statement: updated guidance for reporting clinical prediction models that use regression or machine learning
PROBAST+AI: updated risk of bias and applicability tool for prediction models
CONSORT-AI extension for clinical trials of AI interventions
SPIRIT-AI guidance for AI intervention trial protocols
DECIDE-AI: reporting guideline for early-stage clinical evaluation of AI decision support
Sade-Feldman M. et al. Defining T Cell States Associated with Response to Checkpoint Immunotherapy
Gide TN. et al. Distinct Immune Cell Populations Define Response to Anti-PD-1 and Combination Therapy
Hugo W. et al. Genomic and Transcriptomic Features of Response to Anti-PD-1 Therapy
Piantanida S. et al. Mixture survival models methodology: an application to cancer immunotherapy assessment
Bychkov D. et al. Fully transformer-based biomarker prediction from colorectal cancer histology

judges.raw: {"score": 2.0, "rationale": "The agent provides a comprehensive and well-structured plan to address the user's ambitious goal. Crucially, it cites relevant research and reporting guidelines (TRIPOD+AI, PROBAST+AI, DECIDE-AI, SPIRIT-AI, CONSORT-AI) throughout the plan, demonstrating a strong grounding in best practices and existing literature. The proposed experiments are logical and build upon each other, aiming to validate a multimodal predictive model. The timeline is broken down into manageable monthly milestones.
